title: Tranquil Miyagi Escape near Eboshi Ski Resort with Open-Air Hot Springs & Sauna
description:
Experience the serene beauty of Japan's northern region with a stay at this hotel, perfectly positioned near the Eboshi Ski Resort. After days spent gliding down the slopes or exploring nearby Zao Fox Village, retreat to the hotel's soothing open-air hot springs for a rejuvenating soak, followed by a detoxifying steam in the sauna.

Savour the local flavours of Miyagi at the onsite buffet restaurant, offering a variety of traditional Japanese dishes, or venture out to explore the vibrant local dining scene. Finish your day with a glass of sake or local whisky in the cosy lounge, the perfect nightcap.
offer_address: 1-1, Oniishihara, Togattaonsen, Zao-machi, Katsuta-gun, Miyagi 989-0916, Japan
